overview: Recorded June 1st, 2002 at Emo's Austin, Texas  55 minutes of footage from the Impossibles' final show at Emoâ€™s in Austin, Texas. Also features 24 minutes of interviews with Gabe, Rory and Craig about the history of the band as well as some old videos and a commentary option with Rory and Gabe. title: The Impossibles: (Never) Say Goodbye 06/01/02
